item.title: Moving my DigitalOcean node to Nix (Chapter 1...)
item.description: Lately I have been switching my primary Linux PC from Arch Linux to NixOS, a Linux distribution with a functional twist: completely stateless configuration. It’s been quite a pleasant ride, and Nix the expression language, though a bit lacking in friendly documentation, is actually not that hard to get used to (… but the nixpkgs.lib functions are not!) With the help of home-manager, a Nix module/program that manages user-specific configuation in the same Nix language, I have a completely working .
